thread.title: C&C Music Group Announce Brand New Single from Multi-Award Winning UK Artist, Sandra Godley
thread.title_full: C&C Music Group Announce Brand New Single from Multi-Award Winning UK Artist, Sandra Godley - PR.com

author: PR.com
title: C&C Music Group Announce Brand New Single from Multi-Award Winning UK Artist, Sandra Godley
text:
C&C Music Group Announce Brand New Single from Multi-Award Winning UK Artist, Sandra Godley
C&C Music Group announces the release of the brand new single, Do You Believe? from the UK based, International Recording Artist, Sandra Godley.
Nashville, TN, September 10, 2015 --( PR.com )-- C&C Music Group announces the release of the brand new single, "Do You Believe?" from the UK-based, International Recording Artist, Sandra Godley. The song, written by Godley, focuses on a simple statement on which we should reflect daily. In the song, you will find the lyrics reflecting on things taking place in the world we live in today, while holding on to the power of love.
The latest single (Do you Believe?) is one of the songs from her upcoming sophomore release with the Nashville based label. Jonathan Goodwin, President of C&C Music Group states, "This song is an earth shaker! It is a song that resounds in hearts and lives globally.” Do you Believe is the first release from Sandra's upcoming album called "DIAMONDS" which is scheduled to hit the shelves early 2016.
"Do You Believe?" is now available on iTunes and you can pre-order this much anticipated project by visiting www.sandragodley.org.
For more information, please contact jon@candcmusicgroup.com
Follow Sandra on Social Media #do you believe
Note to Editors:
Sandra Godley received a MOBO nomination in 2013 following the release of "Miracle" her first album to be recorded with C&C Music Group. She has received numerous awards including Woman in Music Award, Wise Woman Awards. Sandra is based in Coventry, UK, but travels extensively around the world.
